title: SET_VEHICLE_ENGINE_ON
content:
0x2497C4717C8B881E0x7FBC86F1// SetVehicleEngineOn
void SET_VEHICLE_ENGINE_ON(Vehicle vehicle, BOOL value, BOOL instantly, BOOL disableAutoStart);Parameters:vehicle: The vehicle to start or stop the engine on.value: true to turn the vehicle on; false to turn it off.instantly: if true, the vehicle will be set to the state immediately; otherwise, the current driver will physically turn on or off the engine.disableAutoStart: If true, the system will prevent the engine from starting when the player got into it.Starts or stops the engine on the specified vehicle.
From what I've tested when I do this to a helicopter the propellers turn off after the engine has started.
codeBlocks:
// SetVehicleEngineOn
void SET_VEHICLE_ENGINE_ON(Vehicle vehicle, BOOL value, BOOL instantly, BOOL disableAutoStart);

local vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(PlayerPedId(), false)
-- Example usage for SET_VEHICLE_ENGINE_ON
SetVehicleEngineOn(vehicle, true, true, true)
